Class.Name: Or
Class.Description: Matches if any of the given matchers matched. If none of the given matchers matched, then it doesn't match. Stops at the first matching matcher (as in short circuit evaluation).

FormalParameter.Name: input
FormalParameter.Description: One or more matchers to test

Class.Name: And
Class.Description: Matches if and only if all matchers within matched. Otherwise, it returns no match. Stops at the first non-matching matcher (as in short circuit evaluation).

FormalParameter.Name: input
FormalParameter.Description: One or more matchers to test

FormalParameter.Name: message
FormalParameter.Description: A message describing why a match couldn't be determined.

Class.Name: Not
Class.Description: Inverses the result of another matcher

FormalParameter.Name: matcher
FormalParameter.Description: Matcher to inverse the result of
